settings.heading: Care Instruction
settings.content:
Care Instructions for Moissanite Jewelry (Silver & Gold)

Thank you for choosing moissanite
jewelry from Lesia Emporium! To ensure your jewelry remains as stunning as the day you received it, please follow these care instructions:

General Care

Avoid Harsh Chemicals: Keep your moissanite jewelry away from harsh chemicals such as bleach, chlorine, and
household cleaning agents. These can damage both the metal and the stone.

Remove During Activities:
Take off your jewelry before engaging in activities that could expose it to physical stress, such as sports, gardening, or heavy lifting.

Storage: Store your jewelry
separately in a soft pouch or a lined jewelry box to prevent scratches or tangling.

Cleaning

Regular Cleaning:  Gently clean your moissanite jewelry with a soft brush and warm, soapy water. Rinse thoroughly and dry with a soft cloth.

Silver Jewelry: For silver settings, use a silver polishing cloth to maintain shine and prevent tarnish. Avoid liquid silver cleaners as they can be too abrasive.

Gold Jewelry: Clean gold
settings with a mild detergent and warm water. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners.

Professional Care

Periodic Inspection: It’s a
good idea to have your jewelry professionally inspected once a year to ensure that the setting is secure and the stone is free from damage.

Professional Cleaning: For
deep cleaning, take your moissanite jewelry to a professional jeweler who can
clean it safely using ultrasonic or steam cleaning methods.

By following these simple steps,
your moissanite jewelry will continue to sparkle and bring you joy for years to
come. If you have any questions or need further assistance, don’t hesitate to
contact us at Lesia Emporium.

 Enjoy your dazzling
moissanite piece!

settings.heading: Shipping & Delivery
settings.content:
• Inside Dhaka within 02 working days & Outside Dhaka within 04 working
    days.
  • Inside Dhaka delivery Charge is 70 Taka, Outside Dhaka Delivery Charge is
    150 Taka.
  • Kindly note that, as per our policy, no product returns will be accepted after delivery. Please inspect the items in front of our delivery personnel for your satisfaction.

Note: Delivery charges may vary depending on product weight and order size.

settings.heading: Refund & Exchange
settings.content:
50% price adjustment of previously purchased products in case of Exchange with our available products (Lifetime).

For example, if you buy something worth of 5000 Taka then you will get a 50% price adjustment that means 5000*50%= 2500 Taka. This 2500 taka will be deducted from the original price of the exchanged product. Suppose the price of the new item which you want to buy is 7500 Taka so after deducting the 2500 taka you will pay 5000 Taka for the new product.

40% Cash Return in case of Product Return (Lifetime).

For example, you want to return the product and take cash in that case if the price of your product is 5000 Taka you will get back 5000*40%=
2000 Taka.

You must come to our office for Refund or Exchange.

You must bring the memo in order to avail the Refund or
Exchange facility.

settings.text: Moissanite is a naturally occurring silicon carbide (SiC) discovered in 1893 by French chemist Henri Moissan, who initially mistook it for diamonds due to its remarkable similarity in appearance. Most moissanite used in jewelry today is lab-created, as natural moissanite is extremely rare.
